item.description:
Where: on the PHONE
( you just pay for the long distance call )

** Phone # & materials will be sent to you
after you RSVP : YES"

Meeting Description:
"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone ...

- with your questions
- to get support and suggestions
- to share your LOA experiences

Yuliya Cohen, presenter at October's meetup, is on the call too. Yuliya is here to answer any straggler questions & to help members further understand how to still get what you want without having to let go & detach from your "low energy" feelings, limiting beliefs & your desired outcome.


Thank you very much, Yuliya, for being available for our members this evening.

To review details of October 7th Meetup agenda:
http://lawofattractio...

About Yuliya Cohen:
www.yuliyacohen.com
Brookline, MA

Yuliya is a trained energy healer, medical intuitive and therapist, and the creator of the Energy Restructuringâ„¢ System. She received her training from the HLCC "Crucible" program, directed by Rev. Rosalyn Bruyere, a world-renowned healer, scholar & researcher in the field of Energy Healing.

Yuliya was formerly an engineer & computer science researcher (including work at Siemens Research and Technology Laboratories) and holds degrees in Civil Engineering from the Kiev School of Civil Engineering & in Computer Science from Brandeis University.

================

Do check our Message Board for info/ discussions from members. You're welcome to post LOA-related topics/ discussions there too.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: LOA Masterminding with Yuliya Cohen
